entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 5:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow after midnight. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
